item.title: Jenny's Perfume N' Things
item.description:
About Us

Jenny’s Perfume N’ Things offers a curated selection of original perfumes, stylish clothing, trendy handbags, exquisite jewelry, and unique gift items. With a focus on quality and individuality, we provide a shopping experience that caters to diverse tastes and preferences.

Our Services

  • Original Perfumes: Authentic fragrances and perfumes
  • Fashion Clothing: Stylish and trendy clothing collection
  • Designer Handbags: Selection of fashionable handbags
  • Jewelry Collection: Exquisite jewelry pieces for all occasions
  • Gift Items: Unique and thoughtful gift selections

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Jenny Ramkhalawan
  • Phone: 346-2376 / 476-0258
  • Email: jennysperfume@gmail.com, flygrljn@aol.com
